message: Noiz pulls me into his room and pushes me down on the soft bed.
He climbs in next to me, ready to go.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wait, wait, wait, wait."
I try to get away, but my back hits the wall.
I'm cornered.

name: ノイズ
message: "Still fighting, huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No shit!"

name: ノイズ
message: "What? You a virgin?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "O-Of course not!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Then what's the big deal? If it's not your first time or anything, let's get to it. Freaking out over this shit is lame as hell."
...This little shit...
Without batting an eyelash, Noiz reaches for my pants and starts unzipping my fly.
I reach out to stop him... but hesitate.
Something feels off.
This guy obviously believes what he said, that it's only natural to "seek relief." I'm the one who thinks it's something to be ashamed of.
Still, isn't that how any normal person would react? How did I end up being the one who looks dumb?
This twerp called me lame...
Is he the crazy one? Or am I being unreasonable here?
Is assuming that the act is sexual what makes it that way? If I treat it like something normal, will that get rid of the shame?
I mean, we are both men. We have the same equipment...
Shit. I don't know what's right anymore...
What is happening to me?

name: ノイズ
message: "We can stop if you're scared."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Who's scared?!"
Noiz's comment sends the blood rushing to my brain.
I mean, can you blame me for getting pissed off?
The more I think about it, the more I realize that I'm being stupid.
I've fooled around with guy friends before. Who hasn't? It's not like I have anything to lose.
We're both guys, right? What's the big deal?
I set my jaw and look Noiz straight in the eye.
Noiz studies me for a few seconds, then takes my hand and guides it to his crotch.

name: ノイズ
message: "Finally coming around?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up."

name: ノイズ
message: "Take it out."
At his urging, I steel myself and undo his belt, then the button of his pants, then slide down his zipper with my sweaty hands.
My heart is pounding. I can feel my face burning up.
